uslt:

title: Close
uslt:

uslt:

[00:06.524]For a while there it was rough

[00:09.467]But lately, I've been doin' better
[00:09.467]而近来 我渐入佳境
[00:13.318]Than the last four cold Decembers I recall

[00:20.215]And I see my family every month
[00:20.215]每个月都能与家人相见
[00:23.483]I found a girl my parents love
[00:23.483]我也觅得父母也交口称赞的另一半
[00:27.143]She'll come and stay the night, and I think I might have it all
[00:27.143]她会来我家过夜 此刻我好似拥有了全世界
[00:34.011]And I thank God every day
[00:34.011]我每天都虔诚感谢上天
[00:37.515]For the girl he sent my way

[00:40.668]But I know the things he gives me, he can take away

title: Roar
uslt:
[00:00.000]Roar Acoustic - Katy Perry
[00:05.920]I used to bite my tongue and hold my breath
[00:05.920]我曾咬紧牙关，屏住呼吸不出声
[00:08.600]Scared to rock the boat and make a mess
[00:08.600]害怕搞砸事情，制造混乱
[00:11.100]So I sat quietly  agreed politely
[00:11.100]所以只好默默静坐，殷勤首肯
[00:16.520]I guess that I forgot I had a choice
[00:16.520]也许我早已忘记我也能掌握全局
[00:19.020]I let you push me past the breaking point
[00:19.020]却任由你一次次触及我底线，我只能默默承受
[00:21.710]I stood for nothing  so I fell for everything
[00:21.710]我一事不执，以致万事难成
[00:26.880]You held me down  but I got up
[00:26.880]你极力想要控制我 但我不会这样屈服
[00:29.310]Already brushing off the dust
[00:29.310]我已摆脱世俗，净化心灵
[00:32.130]You hear my voice  your hear that sound

[02:50.01]So much, it hurts

title: Solace
uslt:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Andrew Hu/Laura Karen Brehm/Paul Aiden
[00:23.58]I could tell within a moment
[00:23.58]瞬息之间  我便心知肚明

[00:26.78]我的一切  你都了若指掌
[00:29.05]I could see you gave me solace
[00:29.05]每当我陷入困顿
[00:32.07]When i needed someone there
[00:32.07]你都会告慰于我
[00:34.58]In the darkness I still see you
[00:34.58]无尽幽暗中  你的身影却不曾暗淡
[00:37.72]Like a golden arch
[00:37.72]就像一座金光四射的拱桥
[00:40.11]Rising high above the sunset
[00:40.11]日落之后  你就是我的太阳
[00:43.27]In every way you are
[00:43.27]我的世界  因你而洒满光芒
[00:45.72]I know that everything's in focus now
[00:45.72]眼前之景  如剥茧抽丝般明朗起来
[00:51.16]I’m seeing clearly for the first time
[00:51.16]那是我第一次揭开它神秘的面纱
[00:56.59]Today I woke up feeling more alive
[00:56.59]今天我醒来时意气风发
[01:02.26]Tomorrow everything will turn around
[01:02.26]明天所有的一切将渐入佳境
[01:15.33]Everything  will turn around
[01:15.33]如旱苗得雨
[01:26.40]Everything  will turn around
[01:26.40]如枯木逢春
[02:36.02]All the days when I am searching
[02:36.02]四处漂泊
[02:39.01]For some kinda sign
[02:39.01]只为寻觅他的踪迹
[02:41.43]Now I've reached the destination
[02:41.43]抵达终点
[02:44.59]There's someone of my kind
[02:44.59]你就是我的生命中的天使
[02:46.86]Keep me breathing with the feeling
[02:46.86]风雨同舟  生死契阔
[02:50.01]Like an LED light
[02:50.01]我们终将光彩夺目
[02:52.31]Now I'm moving through the shadows
[02:52.31]每当我陷入阴影
[02:55.63]You woke me up tonight
[02:55.63]你都会将我唤醒
[02:58.04]I know that everything's in focus now

[03:08.95]Today I woke up feeling more alive

[03:14.55]Tomorrow everything will turn around

[03:27.78]Everything will turn around
[03:27.78]如旱苗得雨
[03:38.92]Everything will turn around

uslt:

[02:12.84]Maybe I'm too old now, Or just afraid, that you'll walk away

[02:20.32]You're acroos the road from me,It's an ocean wide
[02:20.32]你跨过我，来到了一片广阔的海洋.
[02:25.38]And the current's pulling us
[02:25.38]海洋将我们揉搓在一起.
[02:27.66]Dragging me aside
[02:27.66]却又把我抛开.
[02:30.44]Oh, you're a constellation And I'm just a star
[02:30.44]你是一个星座，而我只是一颗星星.
[02:35.49]Begging the universe That you'll never notice me at all
[02:35.49]这是一个你永远不会注意我的世界.
[02:41.47]---
[03:22.32]When you're gone, I don't know what to say
[03:22.32]当你不辞而别，我手无足措.
[03:25.86]And when you're with me, I can't say anything, anyway
[03:25.86]当你和我在一起时，不管怎样，我都默默无言.
[03:30.97]So just believe me, even if the words don't come out
[03:30.97]所以，只需要相信我，甚至当相信二字从未说出口.
[03:35.53]They're here inside my head, stuck inside my mouth
[03:35.53]这二字,在我的脑海中，也卡在我嘴边，无法说出.

title: Fool For You
uslt:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Neil Ormandy/Vanessa Schulz/Martin Wave
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Raymond George Decker III
[00:08.272]I been running over leaving in my head
[00:08.272]大脑回旋着诀别的断念
[00:11.991]Trippin' over all the stupid things you said
[00:11.991]那是你愚蠢的话  使我失足绊倒
[00:16.216]I keep stallin', and now I'm fallin'
[00:16.216]可因沉沦其中 我不能继续等待时机
[00:20.631]It's like I'm constantly questioning you
[00:20.631]这恰似一遍遍的  我对你的审讯
[00:25.020]So if you want me
[00:25.020]所以  如果你欲求我
[00:27.249]Why are you tearing me apart
[00:27.249]为什么要让我经受撕裂之痛
[00:29.650]It's killing me slowly
[00:29.650]那不就是在缓慢无形中  将我杀害
[00:31.817]Watching you hide behind your scars
[00:31.817]看着你隐匿在伤疤的掩映
[00:34.060]Not here when I need you
[00:34.060]我需要你时  你永远不临莅当场
[00:36.076]I been trying to pull through
[00:36.076]努力地  我寻求自我的康复
[00:38.333]You play with my mind
[00:38.333]你在玩弄我的心
[00:39.773]Play with my mind
[00:39.773]你在试探我的意
[00:40.872]Play with my mind
[00:40.872]你在勾斗我的情
[00:42.577]But i'm just a fool for you
[00:42.577]可我在你面前  只能做个傻子
[00:44.787]I play it cool for you
[00:44.787]我为你痴迷  为你愿掩埋内伤
[00:46.916]Every night, feeding me lies, I turn a blind eye too
[00:46.916]每个晚上你演绎的谎言  我假以无视
[00:51.558]I'm just a fool for you
[00:51.558]毕竟  我只是一个你的傻子啊
[00:53.545]I'm just a fool
[00:53.545]我只是一个傻瓜
[00:55.183]For
[00:55.183]都是为了你
[00:56.291]You
[00:56.291]是你
[00:58.202]I'm just a fool for you
[00:58.202]我故作痴狂  全为你
[01:17.590]I know you always tell me what I want to hear
[01:17.590]我也知道  你告诉我的都是我想听的
[01:21.899]It's like it's deafening the silence when you're near
[01:21.899]这就像你的靠近  不是破除寂静  却是掩蔽无言
[01:26.160]All these blurred lines, but I still hold tight
[01:26.160]沉死和生机的界限在我眼前模糊  但我仍愿紧守你
[01:30.600]Hoping you give me something that is real
[01:30.600]不放弃地期许  你能给我真实的美好
[01:35.228]So if you want me
[01:35.228]所以  如若你想要我
[01:37.206]Why are you tearing me apart
[01:37.206]又为什么甘愿将我投掷痛苦之中
[01:39.556]It's killing me slowly
[01:39.556]这无疑加速了我走向消亡的进程
[01:41.590]Watching you hide behind your scars
[01:41.590]看着你尝试躲藏  疤痕是你的庇护之所
[01:43.867]Not here when I need you
[01:43.867]你每每消失在那一刻  我需要你的一刻
[01:45.812]I been trying to pull through
[01:45.812]我会尽力挺过去
[01:48.060]You play with my mind
[01:48.060]你在戏耍我的情意
[01:49.666]Play with my mind
[01:49.666]你要断送我的痴念
[01:50.716]Play with my mind
[01:50.716]你正玩转我的懦弱
[01:52.271]But i'm just a fool for you
[01:52.271]可我只是个  傻子啊
[01:54.754]I play it cool for you
[01:54.754]因为你  我竟然愿意扮演起这样的角色
[01:56.860]Every night, feeding me lies, I turn a blind eye too
[01:56.860]夜夜鼓充我  用你那可笑的谎言  我假装无视
[02:01.055]I'm just a fool for you
[02:01.055]无论如何  你还是那个  我愿意为之疯狂的人
[02:03.341]I'm just a fool
[02:03.341]那个我愿意为之成为傻子的人
[02:05.249]For
[02:05.249]那  都  是  你
[02:06.465]You
[02:06.465]是你啊！
[02:08.605]I'm just a fool for you
[02:08.605]我只是你的傻子罢了
[02:27.503]So if you want me
[02:27.503]所以  要是你想要我

[02:29.610]就别再伤害我
[02:31.958]It's killing me slowly
[02:31.958]别再杀灭我  一分寸一分寸地

[02:33.864]我看你躲在瘢痕背后
[02:36.338]Not here when I need you
[02:36.338]不愿现身在我需求你时
[02:38.127]I been trying to pull through
[02:38.127]怎么办呐  我只能尝试治愈自己
[02:40.362]You play with my mind
[02:40.362]你周转不定 嘲谑我
[02:42.021]Play with my mind
[02:42.021]把玩我
[02:43.061]Play with my mind
[02:43.061]愚弄我
[02:45.798]But i'm just a fool for you
[02:45.798]我都强迫自己忍受
[02:47.358]I play it cool for you
[02:47.358]毕竟  我为你成傻
[02:49.290]Every night, feeding me lies, I turn a blind eye too
[02:49.290]你每夜的谰言  我故作无视
[02:53.368]I'm just a fool for you
[02:53.368]我只是你的傻子
[02:55.662]I'm just a fool

[00:01.015]どうでもいいような夜だけど
[00:01.015]虽然这是个无所谓的夜晚
[00:04.912]響めき煌めきと君も
[00:04.912]但身边有着那声响 光芒 还有你
[00:24.838]まだ止まった刻む針も

[00:29.108]入り浸った散らかる部屋も
[00:29.108]还有时常蜗居的凌乱房间
[00:33.086]変わらないね思い出しては
[00:33.086]都不曾改变
[00:37.315]二人歳を重ねてた
[00:37.315]恍然回神 两人已然相伴走过数个岁月

title: Stereo Hearts
uslt:
[00:00.000]Gym Class Heroes、Adam Levine - Stereo Hearts
[00:00.403]Written by：The Hit List、Adam Levine
[00:00.724]My heart's a stereo
[00:00.724]我的心像立体声  
[00:03.374]It beats for your so listen close
[00:03.374]为你跳动,请靠近我倾听  
[00:06.164]Hear my thoughts in every note
[00:06.164]你将在每一个音符,听到我的心声  
[00:11.396]Make me your radio
[00:11.396]让我成为你的收音机  
[00:14.146]Turn me up when you feel low
[00:14.146]当你情绪低落,打开我听听   
[00:16.706]This melody was meant for you
[00:16.706]所有旋律只为你吟唱   
[00:19.315]Just sing along to my stereo
[00:19.315]只要跟着我的节奏一起唱
[00:21.336]Gym class heroes baby
[00:22.996]If I was just another dusty record on the shelve
[00:22.996]若我只是书架上那脏脏的旧唱片  
[00:25.706]Will you blow me off and play me like everybody else
[00:25.706]你能否垂钓灰尘,将它像其他唱片一样播放  
[00:28.206]If I ask you to scratch my back could you manage that
[00:28.206]如果我要求你播放,你能耐心听听吗  
[00:31.066]Like it read well check it Travie I can handle that
[00:31.066]检查一下,崔维,让它流畅播放 我可以搞定  
[00:33.556]Furthermore I apologize for any skipping tracks
[00:33.556]此外我很抱歉,因为它有点卡  
[00:36.576]This the last girl that play me left a couple cracks

uslt:

uslt:

[00:10.884]I don't feel a single thing
[00:10.884]我毫无感觉

[00:14.082]是药效太强了吗
[00:16.936]Haven't caught up with my friends in weeks

[00:20.010]And now we're outta touch
[00:20.010]现在我们失去了联系
[00:22.524]I've been drivin' in LA

[00:25.268]And the world it feels too big
[00:25.268]这世界是如此之大
[00:28.071]Like a floating ball that's bound to break
[00:28.071]我就像水中的浮球 注定要破裂
[00:31.111]Snap my psyche like a twig

[00:47.285]因为你必须活下来

title: Nothing Like You
uslt:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Daniel Griffith/Anthony West/Josephine Vander Gucht
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Daniel Griffith/Anthony West/Josephine Vander Gucht
[00:07.796]We started in the same neighborhood
[00:07.796]我们的故事开始于同一个社区
[00:11.130]Teenage hope misunderstood
[00:11.130]渴望被误解的青年
[00:13.445]Stars fell around us in a wasted place
[00:13.445]星星陨落在我们身边这片荒芜之地
[00:17.176]We took your parents car out of town
[00:17.176]我们偷开了你父母的车，驶出了这个小镇
[00:20.435]Lost our minds til the sun went down
[00:20.435]失去了理智直至夕阳西下
[00:22.834]So we tried to grow up good one day
[00:22.834]我们试着有天能好好长大
[00:27.271]We were young, kind of foolish
[00:27.271]你我都如此年轻，还有点傻里傻气
[00:29.876]Deep down love kind of friendship
[00:29.876]内心深处的爱意只是出于友谊
[00:32.309]Lost beneath in an endless wave
[00:32.309]在那无尽的海浪中失去了呼吸
[00:36.917]We gave up on the good life
[00:36.917]我们放弃了美好生活
[00:39.250]Threw our souls to the high tide
[00:39.250]将你我的灵魂抛向了高潮
[00:41.684]Never thought it would end this way
[00:41.684]从未认为会以这种方式结束
[00:46.864]We ain't best friends no more
[00:46.864]我们不再是最好的朋友

[00:49.562]因为我一点也不像你
[00:51.747]Two years, no love, no call

[00:54.295]现在我一点也不像你
[00:56.311]I guess I'm riding solo
[00:56.311]我想独自一人
[00:58.536]I guess I gotta let go

[01:26.335]我们的未来也如此

title: Leave
uslt:
[00:00.00]I met you on a Friday
[00:00.00]与你于周五相遇
[00:01.35]Downtown Avenue A
[00:01.35]莅临市中心A大道
[00:03.05]I didn't know you were gonna be my getaway
[00:03.05]我不知道你会成为我的心门
[00:06.51]I swear I never learn
[00:06.51]我发誓我永远学不会
[00:08.10]Can't live without the burn
[00:08.10]能冷淡地度过一生
[00:10.01]So light it up, and feel the rush
[00:10.01]所以请点亮它，并享受匆忙
[00:12.38]Is this how you wanna be remembered?
[00:12.38]这就是你想被铭记的方式吗
[00:15.25]Doin' blow on side streets
[00:15.25]沿着小路向下走去
[00:17.04]Cold like December
[00:17.04]凌冽如冬季
[00:19.11]Is this what you came so far for?
[00:19.11]这就是你从不远万里而来的目的吗
[00:21.88]And I know you know you're worth more
[00:21.88]我知道你认可自己的无价
[00:24.28]So why don't we go and leave the city

[00:00.330]When the days are cold

[00:10.950]当你的美梦沦落
[00:13.320]And the ones we hail
[00:13.320]当我们只得以崇拜强权
[00:15.910]Are the worst of all
[00:15.910]前所未有的噩梦底下
[00:18.400]And the blood’s run stale
[00:18.400]连血液都渐趋陈腐
[00:22.480]I wanna hide the truth
[00:22.480]我想要隐藏内心的真相
[00:25.090]I wanna shelter you
[00:25.090]好构筑庇护你的天国
[00:27.870]But with the beast inside

[00:30.560]There’s nowhere we can hide

[00:38.460]This is my kingdom come

[00:41.280]This is my kingdom come

[00:44.250]当你感受到我的炙热

[00:46.790]请凝视我的双眸
[00:49.260]It’s where my demons hide

[00:51.840]It’s where my demons hide
[00:51.840]它以我的心灵为居所
[00:54.890]Don’t get too close
[00:54.890]不要靠太近
[00:57.620]It’s dark inside
[00:57.620]里面暗无天日
[00:59.860]It’s where my demons hide
[00:59.860]我内心的恶魔就在那
[01:02.500]It’s where my demons hide

[01:06.790]一切都将宣告终结
[01:09.070]When the lights fade out
[01:09.070]光明渐淡

[01:11.720]所有罪恶都蠢蠢欲动
[01:14.490]So they dug your grave
[01:14.490]他们翻挖你的坟墓
[01:17.330]And the masquerade
[01:17.330]撕下你的伪装
[01:19.760]Will come calling out
[01:19.760]我撕心裂肺地嘶吼
[01:22.580]At the mess you made
[01:22.580]在因你而起的这片狼藉中
[01:26.539]Don’t want to let you down
[01:26.539]我不愿让你悲伤
[01:29.350]But I am hell bound
[01:29.350]但我身不由己
[01:32.050]Though this is all for you
[01:32.050]尽管我为你做下了一切
[01:34.500]Don't wanna hide the truth
[01:34.500]但我决心不再隐瞒真相
[01:37.039]No matter what we breed
[01:37.039]无论你我以何为生
[01:39.780]We still are made of greed
[01:39.780]我们都是被贪婪堆砌的动物
[01:42.450]This is my kingdom come
[01:42.450]由我构筑起的欲望王国
[01:45.090]This is my kingdom come
[01:45.090]它已然矗立大地，埋下一片阴影
[01:50.400]When you feel my heat
[01:50.400]当你感受到我的炙热
[01:50.870]Look into my eyes
[01:50.870]请凝视我的双眸
[01:53.240]It’s where my demons hide
[01:53.240]我内心的恶魔就在那
[01:55.770]It’s where my demons hide
[01:55.770]它就躲藏在那一方天地
[01:58.780]Don’t get too close
[01:58.780]不要轻易涉足
[02:01.510]It’s dark inside
[02:01.510]那里暗无天日
[02:03.890]It’s where my demons hide
[02:03.890]它躲藏在那里
[02:06.450]It’s where my demons hide
[02:06.450]它蛰伏在那里！
[02:09.500]They say it's what you make
[02:09.500]人们讥讽我咎由自取
[02:11.860]I say it's up to fate
[02:11.860]我笑答这是命中注定
[02:14.660]It's woven in my soul
[02:14.660]尽管灵魂深处依旧纠结
[02:17.200]I need to let you go
[02:17.200]但我还是选择将你放下
[02:19.880]Your eyes, they shine so bright
[02:19.880]你的双瞳明亮如皓日当空
[02:22.490]I want to save that light
[02:22.490]我希望能将其占为己有
[02:25.110]I can't escape this now
[02:25.110]但我已经无从挣脱桎梏
[02:27.770]Unless you show me how
[02:27.770]除非你能引领我走出黑暗
[02:31.400]When you feel my heat
[02:31.400]当你被我的炙热迷惑时
[02:33.460]Look into my eyes
[02:33.460]直视我的双眸
[02:35.940]It’s where my demons hide
[02:35.940]看清深藏于此的恶魔
[02:38.480]It’s where my demons hide
[02:38.480]看清它的狰狞面貌！
[02:41.470]Don’t get too close
[02:41.470]不要轻易接近我！
[02:43.990]It’s dark inside
[02:43.990]我的内心暗无天日！
[02:46.530]It’s where my demons hide
[02:46.530]因为我是恶魔寄居的容器！
[02:49.100]It’s where my demons hide
[02:49.100]因为我是被恶魔凭依的傀儡！

uslt:
